title: Generated report
mission: Compose the final deliverable: a comprehensive technical report that documents the literature baseline, the candidate frameworks, results of prototype experiments, critical analysis of limitations, and a prioritized research roadmap (next 1-, 3-, and 5-year milestones). Include equations, figures, references (BibTeX), and appendices with code links and data artifacts.

deliverable.minimumContent: Comprehensive technical report with at least 2000 words, including equations, at least 6 figures or tables (from simulations or schematic diagrams), a BibTeX file with >= 40 entries, and links to runnable code reproducing the key toy-model results.
